subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Phillip Livas returned a kickoff 97 yards, Daniel Porter ran for 78 yards and a touchdown and Louisiana Tech (8-5) won the Independence Bowl with a 17-10 victory against Northern Illinois (6-7) in Shreveport, La. It was Louisiana Tech’s first postseason win since the 1977 Independence Bowl and its seventh come-from-behind win this season.
